message_box_cancel_window.title: Cancel window..
message_box_cancel_window.text: Are you sure to cancel to prevoius window?
message_box_cancel_window.name: messagebox_green

information.title: INFO
information.name: messagebox_green
information.text:
ESC -> Exit window 
RIGHT ARROW -> pass few seconds
LEFT ARROW -> return few seconds
UP ARROW -> sound up
DOWN ARROW -> sound down
SPACE -> pause and play
LEFT SHIFT + UP ARROW -> sound maximum
LEFT SHIFT + DOWN ARROW -> sound minimum
LEFT SHIFT + RIGHT ARROW -> next song
LEFT SHIFT + LEFT ARROW -> previous song

information2.title: INFO
information2.name: messagebox_green
information2.text:
CTRL-left + < + RIGHT ARROW -> pass few seconds
CTRL-left + < + LEFT ARROW -> return few seconds
CTRL-left + < +UP ARROW -> sound up
CTRL-left + < + DOWN ARROW -> sound down
CTRL-left + < + SPACE -> pause and play
CTRL-left + < + z + RIGHT ARROW -> next song
CTRL-left + < + z + LEFT ARROW -> previous song

removing_video.title: Removing video
removing_video.text: Are you sure to remove this video from data?
removing_video.name: messagebox_red
